customer_addr:
5550 S Becks Mill Rd
Salem, IN 47167

citations.narrative:
According to the licensee, on December 27, 2024, German Shepherds dogs, Roxy and Bella were let out by the licensee
in the unenclosed front yard of the facility. The licensee stated that both Roxy and Bella ran away from the facility but
were later found unharmed. An animal escape can cause severe distress, trauma, and/or physical harm to the animal.
Handling of all animals must be done in a manner that cannot lead to an animal escape and prevent trauma, behavioral
stress, physical harm or unnecessary discomfort. The facility must ensure animal escapes and resulting distress does not
happen in the future.
Correct by: January 21, 2025, moving forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.131(b)(1) 
   
Handling of animals. 
According to the licensee, on December 27, 2024, German Shepherds dogs, Roxy and Bella were let out by the licensee 
in the unenclosed front yard of the facility. The licensee stated that both Roxy and Bella ran away from the facility but 
were later found unharmed. An animal escape can cause severe distress, trauma, and/or physical harm to the animal. 
Handling of all animals must be done in a manner that cannot lead to an animal escape and prevent trauma, behavioral 
stress, physical harm or unnecessary discomfort. The facility must ensure animal escapes and resulting distress does not 
happen in the future. 
 
Correct by: January 21, 2025, moving forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
